channel.title: 525/508 compiler help plz
channel.description:
first of all, i know im supposed to post in compiling errors sticky, but tbh, no one helps on that thread, so heres my problem
ok, i have 525/508 im working on,
first of all i have jdk, i can compile
the error i get when compiling is
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command oparable program or batch file. press any key to continue...
when i edit the compiler it says
@echo off cd src javac -d ../bin *.java pause
what part of of it do i edit...O.o

item.title: 525/508 compiler help plz
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

first of all, i know im supposed to post in compiling errors sticky, but tbh, no one helps on that thread, so heres my problem

ok, i have 525/508 im working on,

first of all i have jdk, i can compile

the error i get when compiling is

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command oparable program or batch file.
press any key to continue…

when i edit the compiler it says

@echo off
cd src
javac -d …/bin *.java
pause

what part of of it do i edit…O.o
